EmailTemplate.subject: Maine New Hampshire IT Pro Exclusive Pizzanar: Revolutionizing Clouds
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=par4&utm_content=011415> You're Invited to an Exclusive FREE Virtual Pizzanar <http://www.par4tech.com/vmturbo> What Free Pizzanar (Webinar + Pizza Delivered to You) Topic Revolutionizing Virtual and Cloud Environments When Friday, February 13, 2015 at 12PM Register par4tech.com/vmturbo <http://www.par4tech.com/vmturbo> Par 4 & VMturbo invite you to enjoy lunch on us while you learn about Revolutionizing Cloud and Virtual Environments. Attend our free virtual Lunch ‘n Learn on Friday, February 13th at 12pm. Register today and we will send you pizza or lunch of your choice, for the event.
In this live webinar, you’ll learn how to:
- Continuously assure workload performance by preventatively realigning resources, before degradations occur - Maximize infrastructure utilization with performance-driven capacity management & planning - Reserve & deploy new workloads without disrupting existing apps - Agentless, self-contained virtual instance typically deploys in 30 minutes, regardless of scale
Don’t miss the opportunity to ask the experts and gain insight on today’s revolutionizing technology!
500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
